definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: You know, I'm moving to Japan to learn Japanese.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，我要去日本学日语了。

sentences.english: The study on Japan for Chinese in a real sense was formed during Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 中国真正意义上的日本学研究形成于有明一代。

definition: Tokyo Imperial University (renamed Tokyo University after 1945)
pinyin: Dong1 jing1 Di4 guo2 Da4 xue2

definition: to abandon the old (Asian) ways and learn from Europe/refers to the ideas that led to the Meiji Restoration and Japan's subsequent colonization projects in Asia
to switch from one major or faculty to another (at a university)
sinology/Chinese studies (in foreign schools)/Han Learning, a Qing dynasty movement aiming at a philological appraisal of the Classics
Dutch studies (study of Europe and the world in premodern Japan)
